description: The Marineford Arc is the culmination of the Summit War Saga, featuring the massive battle at Marine Headquarters between the Whitebeard Pirates and the Marines for the execution of Portgas D. Ace.

keyEvents.title: Little Oars Jr. Charges Through Marineford Bay
keyEvents.significance: One of the most emotional and tragic moments of the arc, demonstrating the bonds of friendship that drive the war.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Severs Little Oars Jr.'s Leg
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the brutal nature of the Shichibukai and the devastating casualties of war.

keyEvents.title: Little Oars Jr. Falls
keyEvents.significance: Tragic end to one of the arc's most sympathetic characters, highlighting the cost of war.
